Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , or 16 ) polymers were synthesized according to the optimized literature procedures and the synthetic scheme is shown in Scheme 1.^39 The Corey - House synthesis of 3-bromothiophene and oxalyl dichloride gave 1,2di(thiophen-3-yl)ethane-1,2-dione ( 1 ) as a brown needle - like crystal in a good yield ( 70% ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) polymers |
| 1,2di(thiophen-3-yl)ethane-1,2-dione (1) |
| 3-bromothiophene |
| oxalyl dichloride |

The paragraph mentions the synthesized polymers with varying n values, which are grouped under the name "PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) polymers." The specific material 1,2di(thiophen-3-yl)ethane-1,2-dione (1) is also mentioned. Additionally, 3-bromothiophene and oxalyl dichloride are mentioned as reactants in the synthesis process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) polymers |
| 1,2di(thiophen-3-yl)ethane-1,2-dione (1) |

The paragraph mentions the synthesized polymers with varying n values, which are grouped under the name "PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) polymers." The specific material 1,2di(thiophen-3-yl)ethane-1,2-dione (1) is also mentioned. These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material names.
